B.Tech in Information and Communication Technology

PROJECTS


Auto Tagging Script for Scrapped Courses ​- Personal Project

● Developed a script that scrapped courses from online providers, stored
it in a database.
● Created another Script using NLP to determine specific keywords and
add them as tags or courses in the database.

Trip Management System ​- Database Management System

● Created a full fledged database system using MYSQL and connected it
with the frontend via PHP.
● Users can book tickets, reserve hotels, and go sightseeing.

Modeled spreading of Dengue Virus ​- Probability and Random Processes

● Using past data present, we divided the city in various square grids.
● Distinguished 13 different types of stages for the mosquito and defined
various other responsible factors
● Stimulated the results in MATLAB and generated the graphs regarding
its spread in the city

App controlled Multi-level Farming Robot ​- Embedded System Design

● The robot was controlled using an APP and contained ARDUINO
MEGA at its core.
● It could irrigate, sow seeds and dig the soil.
● Multiple sensors were used to determine the movement, water and
seed flow.

Multi Threading CPU ​- Data Structure and Algorithm

● A JAVA application that could replicate multi-threading process based
on users will, add them to preference queues or shift them back

Microprocessor ​- Computer Organisation

● Using verilog we made atomic modules of the processor
● Towards the end of the semester we could generate a functional
integrated microprocessor which was tested on hardware
